about_the_game:
Dirty Business

Enter the criminal underworld and build your empire. Manage illegal operations like drug dealing, counterfeit money, arms trafficking, and theft while hiding behind legitimate businesses. Complete trade missions, expand operations, and rise to become the city's most feared crime lord.

Form Your Gang

Recruit street gangs and outcasts to build a powerful crew. A larger, skilled team ensures dominance in mafia battles and boosts your operations. With a strong gang, increase efficiency, production, and secure your place as the city's most formidable force.

Clashes and Heists

Seize rival mafia territories, raid their businesses, and steal resources for your empire. Battle for essential supplies like drugs, arms, and cash. Each victory takes you closer to becoming the ultimate crime boss.

Conquer the City

Take over territories and eliminate rival mafias. Expand your reign, defeat the city's top cartel, and secure your throne as the undisputed leader of the underworld. Rule the city with power and fear!

content_descriptors.notes: In some missions in the game, murder occurs, and in some missions, drug production takes place.

About the Game

Dirty Business

Enter the criminal underworld and build your empire. Manage illegal operations like drug dealing, counterfeit money, arms trafficking, and theft while hiding behind legitimate businesses. Complete trade missions, expand operations, and rise to become the city's most feared crime lord.

Recruit street gangs and outcasts to build a powerful crew. A larger, skilled team ensures dominance in mafia battles and boosts your operations. With a strong gang, increase efficiency, production, and secure your place as the city's most formidable force.

Seize rival mafia territories, raid their businesses, and steal resources for your empire. Battle for essential supplies like drugs, arms, and cash. Each victory takes you closer to becoming the ultimate crime boss.

name: Gangster Boss Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RADEON RX 480
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 / AMD RADEON RX 590
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Conquer the city in Gangster Boss Simulator! Build your criminal empire by producing drugs, crafting weapons, and trading illegal goods. Rise from a small-time gangster to a feared gang boss in this thrilling open-world experience. Seize power, dominate territories, and rule the streets!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Estonian
*languages with full audio support
